Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into three registers: 1 - Three rows of Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Eight recessed representations of figures sniffing lotus-flowers. 3 - Eight columns of Hieroglyphic/Hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 3. (pl.2)
